<script>
(function(){
  const GA_ID = 'G-DVT1KMSK18';
  const loadAnalytics = () => {
    if (window.__rgGaLoaded) {
      return;
    }
    window.__rgGaLoaded = true;
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.gtag = function gtag(){ dataLayer.push(arguments); };
    window.gtag('js', new Date());
    window.gtag('config', GA_ID);
    const script = document.createElement('script');
    script.src = 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=' + GA_ID;
    script.async = true;
    document.head.appendChild(script);
  };
  const queueIdle = () => {
    if ('requestIdleCallback' in window) {
      requestIdleCallback(loadAnalytics, { timeout: 5000 });
    } else {
      setTimeout(loadAnalytics, 2000);
    }
  };
  window.addEventListener('load', queueIdle, { once: true });
  ['scroll','keydown','pointerdown'].forEach((eventName) => {
    window.addEventListener(eventName, loadAnalytics, { once: true, passive: true });
  });
})();
</script>
